description: Migo provides credit underwriting infrastructure to enterprise customers (generally merchants, banks, telcos, and fintechs) that wish to extend loans to their customers.

Mineski touches every part of the eSports value chain by operating cafes, having multiple globally-successful pro eSports teams, an eSports event production business, a news site as well as a media platform on Youtube and Twitch.
Ministry of Food is a Lebanon-based restaurant management company offering fast-casual experiences with gourmet tastes from locally sourced foods.
Miroculus is a biotech company that provides hands-off sample-to-answer solutions for molecular testing.
MobiNetS enables mobile phone operators to make better informed business decisions by providing them with a dynamic, end-to-end view of their networks.
Modacruz’s user-friendly marketplace for pre-loved fashion items, accessible on web and mobile, provides a seamless experience for Turkish sellers and buyers.
Moneyfarm is an online investment advisor and one of the largest digital wealth management companies in Europe.
MonoJO is a biotech company that is considered a hub for innovations for pharmacists and biotechnologists in Jordan.

MotorK is a leading software as a service (“SaaS”) provider for the automotive retail industry in the EMEA region. MotorK empowers car manufacturers and dealers to improve their customer experience through a broad suite of fully integrated digital products and services.
MoveEdu is an education franchise company, providing free courses, language courses, and educational programs for children.

Mumzworld is an e-commerce retailer in the region focused exclusively on products for expecting mothers and their babies, infants, and young children. Mumzworld was acquired by the Tamer Group in 2021.

MUNCH:ON is a food tech startup offering office workers food from the best restaurants at a significant discount and with free delivery. The company recently expanded its offering to residential locations.
Musement is an online platform for activities, tours, museums, shows and art events. Launched in 2014, it was acquired in 2018 by TUI Group.

MXD is a global supplier and manufacturer of liquid processing and industrial mixing equipment, streamlining operations for businesses across a wide range of industries that include oil and gas, pharmaceutical companies, and specialty chemicals.
My Ceviche delivers a tasty, fresh, and affordable range of ceviches, salads, tacos, burritos, and stone crabs to Miami customers.
Nada Debs has built an elite design brand manufactured by a network of artisans in Lebanon.
Natura Agro capitalizes on Egypt’s microclimates to grow and process fresh, canned, roasted, and ready-to-eat fruits and vegetables that it white labels and exports for clients.

Neoassist offers a customer service SaaS platform that unifies all channels: smart service (bot), chat, phone, email, workflow, Facebook and manual registration, evaluation (trustvox), mobile, Instagram and video chat.

Neptuno Pumps is a global manufacturer of industrial pumps that developed the first circular economy model in the industry, reusing and recycling end-of-life parts to produce new pumps and spare parts.
Nestrom is an Integrated Field Service Management Platform.
